Key Match Events: Pascal Gross fired in the winner in the 89th minute.
Christos Tzolis's double effort from close range was blocked by goalkeeper Manuel Neuer.
Neuer could not hold on to another Tzolis shot in the 33rd, leading to Giorgos Masouras's goal.
Kai Havertz's goal in the 55th minute leveled the score.
Benjamin Henrichs rattled the crossbar with a 20-metre shot.
Pre-Game Insights: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann confirmed he was cutting Stuttgart goalkeeper Alexander Nübel as he finalized the 26-player squad for the tournament.
Nagelsmann committed in March to having Neuer as his first-choice goalkeeper for Euro 2024.
Post-Match Reflections: Germany midfielder Toni Kroos commented on the team's mistakes in the first half and their improved focus in the second half.
Nagelsmann acknowledged the team's slow start and emphasized the need for better possession control.
Nagelsmann mentioned the upcoming preparation for the match against Scotland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at Borussia-Park in Mönchengladbach, Germany.
